## Why Choose the EC.JD500.001 Bare Bulb?

### Unmatched Brightness & Clarity
The EC.JD500.001 Bare Bulb is designed to deliver exceptional brightness and clarity, ensuring that you never miss a detail whether you're projecting a movie, a video game, or a crucial business presentation. With 240W E20.8, this bulb is a powerhouse that illuminates every scene with brilliant precision.

### Universal Compatibility
This replacement bulb is compatible with multiple Acer projector models, including:
- H6500
- E140
- HE-802
- M1P1108
- X1213P/X1213PH/X1213
- X1216
- D315
- X1313PWH/X1313PW

Whether you're a tech enthusiast or someone who enjoys the occasional movie night, this bulb fits seamlessly into your projector, making installation a breeze.
